thig3.2:4.3: I had failed to find peace of heart,
thig3.2:4.4: or any control over my mind.
thig3.2:5.4: the aggregates, sense fields, and elements.
thig3.2:6.1: When I had heard her teaching,
thig3.2:6.3: I sat for seven days in the same posture,
thig3.2:6.4: given over to rapture and bliss.
thig3.2:6.5: On the eighth day I stretched out my feet,
thig3.2:6.6: having shattered the mass of darkness.
